definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Michael Jackson (1958-2009), American musician and entertainer
pinyin: Mai4 ke4 er3 · Jie2 ke4 xun4

sentences.english: Jack subdues the suspect but realizes Hampton has been shot.
sentences.chinese: 杰克制服了嫌犯，但他发现杰西被子弹击中了。

sentences.english: Jack was one of his old compatriots.
sentences.chinese: 杰克是他的老伙伴之一。

sentences.english: So, what was the concept Akon and Jackson tried to deliver on the song?
sentences.chinese: 那么阿肯和杰克逊试图通过这首歌传递什么理念呢？

sentences.english: The newly discovered notes are nothing more than Jack's personal journal.
sentences.chinese: 新发现的笔记只不过是杰克的个人日记。

sentences.english: Jack has rather jaundiced opinions about all these modern ideas.
sentences.chinese: 杰克对所有这些现代观念都抱有相当偏颇的看法。

sentences.english: But I want you to do it with Jake.
sentences.chinese: 但是我希望你和杰克一起做。

sentences.english: Murray admitted giving Jackson a small dose of propofol to help him sleep.
sentences.chinese: 穆雷承认给了杰克逊一小剂异丙酚来匡助他睡眠。

sentences.english: Allison, Jack and I wanna see you in his office.
sentences.chinese: 艾莉森，来下办公室，我和杰克找你。

sentences.english: The Dunnings have a wealth of stories from the time they spent with Jackson.
sentences.chinese: 邓宁斯有一段与杰克逊共同度过的宝贵的人生经历。

sentences.english: I've been tasked with psychoanalyzing Jack after his mental breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在负责对崩溃后的杰克使用精神分析疗法。

sentences.english: Jack and the other men were hanged.
sentences.chinese: 杰克和其他男海盗都被处绞刑。

sentences.english: Jack began to buff and puff when asked awkward question.
sentences.chinese: 要是问到棘手的问题，杰克就开始颠三倒四地胡说。

sentences.english: Mr Johnson attended the meting for our school.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊先生代表我校参加了会议。

sentences.english: Jack dehorts me from visiting Israel.
sentences.chinese: 杰克劝阻我出访以色列。

sentences.english: John and Jack went through many troubles together to become foul weather friends.
sentences.chinese: 约翰和杰克经历了许多麻烦，一起成为患难之交。

sentences.english: Jack is totally in love with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 杰克爱他的女友爱得五体投地。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
